thread.title: LabCorp's Zero Coupon Convertible Subordinated Notes Due 2021 To Accrue Contingent Interest

author: Reuters Editorial
title: LabCorp's Zero Coupon Convertible Subordinated Notes Due 2021 To Accrue Contingent Interest

organizations.name: accrue contingent interest  laboratory corporation of america holdings

text:
Laboratory Corporation Of America Holdings:
* LABCORPâ€™S ZERO COUPON CONVERTIBLE SUBORDINATED NOTES DUE 2021 TO ACCRUE CONTINGENT INTEREST
* LABCORP - CONTINGENT CASH INTEREST, WHICH CO HAS DETERMINED TO BE ABOUT $2.90/NOTE, WILL BE PAYABLE TO HOLDERS OF ZERO COUPON NOTES AS OF RECORD DATE
* LABCORP - PAYMENT OF CONTINGENT CASH INTEREST IS EXPECTED TO BE MADE ON SEPTEMBER 12, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
